title: I need help urgent
body:
alright so I have written about 2 of these saying I can't open my league and before anyone says check this check that. I have tried running as admin and stuff like that, I have tried deleting the RADS folders all that good stuff, I don't have AVAST and I've re installed but I can't do the download part because it won't open up the league when I click the launcher.
If anyone knows what's going on I'd appreciate it because I'm sick of being told to read the other threads and told the same stuff over again. Thanks xx

replies.body: Have you tried opening the game with the **lol.launcher.admin.exe**? It is found in the top of your LoL folder.
